description: Create a 3D visualization of a website, GitHub repo or local directory

Create a 3D visualization of a GitHub repository
Create a hierarchical 3D visualization of a local directory with depth 3

helpText:
Creates an interactive 3D force-directed graph visualization.

Usage: /create3d [source] [sourceType] [layout] [depth]

- source: URL or path to visualize
- sourceType: 'website', 'github', or 'local'
- layout: 'force', 'radial', or 'hierarchical'
- depth: scanning depth (1-5)
